hero.title: Pao Pool
hero.description: "Pao" means "Bubble" in Chinese. We are an independent, family-run development team dedicated to the Cardano ecosystem. Pao Pool is our transparent and reliable Cardano stake pool, with over a year of stable operation. Your delegation is direct support for our development work.
hero.tagline: Stake your ADA and build with us.
hero.starknet.title: Bubble Validator
hero.starknet.description: Bubble Validator is our validator node deployed on the Starknet network. While our team's primary focus is currently on the Cardano ecosystem, we continue to closely follow the developments on Starknet. We invite STRK token holders to support our development work by staking with us.
whyUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyUs.reasons.supportDevelopment.title: Support Independent Development
whyUs.reasons.supportDevelopment.descrip: We are committed to bringing novel and engaging applications to the Cardano ecosystem. Your delegation is the core driving force behind our work.
whyUs.reasons.professionalism.title: Professional & Reliable
whyUs.reasons.professionalism.descriptio: Our team has extensive blockchain development experience, ensuring the pool operates stably and securely, 24/7.
whyUs.reasons.ecosystemContribution.desc: We actively participate in the Cardano community, contributing to the healthy development and continuous innovation of the ecosystem.
whyUs.reasons.decentralization.title: Championing Decentralization
whyUs.reasons.decentralization.descripti: As an independent stake pool, we aim to operate sustainably through Cardano's unique staking and governance mechanisms, showcasing the limitless potential for independent creators on a decentralized network.
whyUs.reasons.potentialRewards.title: Potential Rewards
whyUs.reasons.potentialRewards.descripti: To thank our early supporters, we will periodically provide exclusive gifts or airdrops to our delegators.
stakingGuide.cardano.title: How to Stake to PAO Pool? üéØ
stakingGuide.cardano.steps.step1.title: Go to Staking Page
stakingGuide.cardano.steps.step1.descrip: Click the "Stake" button to go to the delegation page.
stakingGuide.cardano.steps.step2.title: Connect Wallet
stakingGuide.cardano.steps.step3.descrip: Click "Delegate" and confirm the transaction to start earning ADA rewards!
stakingGuide.starknet.title: How to Stake to Our Starknet Validator?
stakingGuide.starknet.steps.step1.title: Go to Staking Page
stakingGuide.starknet.steps.step1.descri: Click the "Stake" button to proceed to the staking page.
stakingGuide.starknet.steps.step2.title: Connect Wallet
stakingGuide.starknet.steps.step2.descri: In the top-right corner, click "Connect Wallet" and approve the connection.
stakingGuide.starknet.steps.step3.title: Initiate Stake
stakingGuide.starknet.steps.step3.descri: Once your wallet is successfully connected, find and click the "Stake" button.
stakingGuide.starknet.steps.step4.title: Confirm Transaction
stakingGuide.starknet.steps.step4.descri: Enter the amount you wish to stake and the reward address, then click "Delegate" and confirm the transaction to start earning rewards.
stakingGuide.starknet.note: For a detailed guide, refer to the Official Starknet Guide.
acknowledgement.title: Acknowledgement
acknowledgement.message: A heartfelt thank you to every delegator for your trust and support!
about.title3: a small family workshop taking root and growing on Cardano.
about.ourDreams.title: Our Dream ‚ú®
about.ourDreams.description: In our view, the future belongs to those who can march to the beat of their own drum‚Äîthe sovereign individuals. This era has given us two of the greatest gifts: AI and Cardano.
about.ourDreams.column1.title: AI's Power
about.ourDreams.column1.description: The "plug-in" of creativity, small teams can do a lot of things.
about.ourDreams.column2.title: Cardano Ecosystem
about.ourDreams.column2.description: The independent creator's stronghold in the decentralized network.
about.ourDreams.vision: We hope that our small workshop can firmly plant its roots in the Cardano ecosystem, operating independently and sustainably through the power of staking and decentralized governance. All the while, we'll continue to explore the boundaries of Cardano's capabilities, bringing fun, elegant, and practical products to the community.
about.ourTeam.description: A small and beautiful family workshop.
about.slogan: A small family workshop rooted in Cardano üíù
about.ourTeam.martin.name: Martin
about.ourTeam.martin.title: Product & Development
about.ourTeam.martin.description: Trouble with code is a daily routine
about.ourTeam.yoyo.name: Yoyo
about.ourTeam.yoyo.title: Designer
about.ourTeam.paopao.name: Paopao
about.ourTeam.paopao.title: Our Baby
about.ourTeam.paopao.description: Expert in selling cute and interrupting work
products.title: Our Products ‚ú®
products.description: Explore innovative products from Bubble Studio for the Cardano ecosystem.
products.voda.name: VODA
products.voda.description: A Cardano governance participation platform that empowers every ADA holder to have their voice heard.
